site_name: Basement Ground Floor And First Floor Flat
decision_conditions: +3 Ext work to unLB in a CA (Refusal PP)
description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 19th April 2024 (RN 24/00583/FULL) for the addition of a mansard storey with dormer windows to front elevation, reconfiguration of first floor windows to front elevation, addition of a concealed roof terrace to provide private external space, replacement and relocation of existing front door (No. 42A). Alterations to fenestration and doors to front and rear elevations, the addition of conservation skylights to concealed roof pitches, refurbishment of the rear terrace, to include upgraded railings, addition of a new spiral stair linking the terrace and garden inclusion of narrow walk on skylights, addition of a pavement light within existing curtilage to bring light into vaults below and internal alterations (No. 42). NAMELY, installation of three conservation roof lights within the mansard roof aligned with the dormers, recess to the front wall removed and form of the doors updated, new minor porch over the central door.
